chapters.title: Chapter 22: To Make an Anchor Weep
chapters.info: Cemeille din Selaan Long Eyes, p. 475—Tall, lean Atha'an Miere Sailmistress of the darter Wind Racer. She is pretty, perhaps. Though young, she has been awarded three medals for bravery. She brings the dire news of the Amayar to the First Twelve.
